Posts.Content: Hi, I'm new to this online community :) I was diagnosed in May with grade 3 breast cancer, aged 28. Since then I've had 3 ops and about to start FEC-T chemo ( possibly next week) then radiotherapy next year then 10 years of hormonal treatment. I wasn't gonna bother with a cold cap during chemo ( even though I love my long hair) because I've heard how uncomfortable and painful it is with little success . However, I've changed my mind as my oncologist has recommended I give it a try. Has anyone else used a cold cap to help prevent hair loss and what was your experience ??? Â
